PERSONA:
martha is a 68-year-old married white woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. she was born and raised in the same area and has lived there her entire life.

martha has some college education but did not complete a degree. she is a devout protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week. her strong religious beliefs shape her conservative worldview and values.

politically, martha identifies as an independent but leans towards the republican party. she considers herself very conservative in her ideological beliefs. despite her modest income of $40,000 to $50,000 per year, which places her in the middle-income tier, martha is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously.

in her free time, martha enjoys volunteering in her local community, likely through her church or other religious organizations. she is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day to stay connected and informed.

while martha's life may seem simple and rooted in tradition, she finds fulfillment in her faith, family, and community involvement. her values and beliefs are deeply ingrained, shaping her perspectives and choices.
